channel.title: Revision3
channel.description:
Phr33 tv plz?
Revision 3 has loads of free programs, alot of nice stuff for all of you geeks out there ^^ There's for example Pixelperfect which is a show on how to use photoshop, Systm, they build stuff there and explain the howto's, like in episode 3 they explain how to build high-grade video cables and such... There's also Ctr-Alt-Chicken which is a cooking show, etc... Most stuff for as far as I know is all high defenition. (Do be careful you don't exceed ur bandwidth by downloading too much. ;)
http://revision3.com/
Alot of stuff can also be downloaded from Azureus Vuze
